channel.title: c on commana's home page
channel.description: Recent content in c on commana's home page

item.title: C
item.description: The C programming language can be difficult for developers that are used to high-level concepts and libraries from their favorite language. At least for me, going “back” to C from languages like Java or JavaScript feels daunting. Since I decided to write programs in the spirit of Donald Knuth, I took on two projects that I am going to write in C: an image viewer with programming language support – where the programming language will be the second project.
